Keywords: Female Furies , Injustice League , Legion of Doom , Scientist , Secret Six , Secret Society of Super-Villains , Suicide Squad
Real Name: Dr. Doris Zuel
Special Powers
GIANT RETALIATION: VILLAINS UNITE: POWER: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Giganta or damaged another friendly character since your last turn. Place Giganta such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so. // If Giganta is on a themed team this trait is activated as FREE instead.
SIZE MANIPULATION: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose that Giganta has [Giant symbol] until your next turn. If you do, she takes a maximum of 2 damage from attacks until your next turn.

jaysol
[url]https://win.wizkids.com/bb/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=16089&sid=5996b43884698945e2e9a645bcd9db26[/url] Giganta does not get to use Willpower when she chooses to be giant sized.
June 9, 2021
Organous
I think we've finally hit the point that I'm ok with a retaliation-themed piece. She's not swinging above 10, only goes after 1 character, and is fairly reasonable on the point cost. You could have her retaliate and run away, or be gutsy with two attacks (especially if you can go after multiple things with a giant Quake). Lots of keywords to get her on teams, and even though there's only one generic keyword, it's a good one.
